Description: The 4S atlas with 156 regions, warped to the MNI Infant cohort 1 template space, at the resolution of the subject's anatomical image.

atlas_name.Description: The name of the source atlas for this node.

index_17network.Description: The corresponding integer value of this node in the 17-network Schaefer atlas imaging file.

name_17network.Description: The label of the node as it appears in the canonical Schaefer 17-network atlas.

name_7network.Description: The label of the node as it appears in the canonical Schaefer 7-network atlas.

network_label.Description: The name of the network this node is assigned to in the Schaefer 7-network atlas.

network_label_17network.Description: The name of the network this node is assigned to in the Schaefer 17-network atlas.
